job: Analyzing project data in BIM (Building Information Modeling).
Analyzing project data in BIM (Building Information Modeling).

Development and approval of BIM Execution Plans (BEPs) and Employer's information Requirements (EIRs). Managing the project Common Data Environments (CDE) using BIM 360. Preparation of BIM models and asset information for handover to client. Attending coordination meetings.

Implementation of BIM technology in the internal business processes of the company and ensuring the effective work of BIM team. BIM software selection and evaluation. Ensure ongoing development and implementation of standards, templates and libraries. Identify/undertake training needs when require.

job: Implementation BIM modelling technology. Assistance with clash detection and conflict resolution using Navisworks. Undertaking modelling exercises in Revit to assist the site team.
